name: Mars Sunrise
description:
https://leon-a0.sp.backtrace.io/p/GameJam/overview

This is a Game I developed during the Gamejam of backtrace the Theme was no violence  so I got this idea of exploring the unknown with the risk and excitement that is involved  Mars is a harsh and unknown place but at the same time, is welcoming in the way human kind want to colonize it , just like the old explorers this kind of Adventure has his own problems one miss step and you are in big trouble I try to represent this here the human kind always has play chess with the environment and more less has emerged victorious, or at least is something we like to think :)
